Package org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.utils

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DownloadBuilder
    A standard download for FHIR has the following properties It includes all the html pages it includes all the images / css / etc it doesn't include zips, jars, tgz - they are left in place, and references to them redirected to the source any reference to history.html (or directory.html for core) All the files are pushed down to \site a single index.html which redirects to site\index.html is included
    FeedBuilder  
    HTMLRedirectScanner  
    IGPackageChecker  
    IGRedirectorGenerator  
    IGRegistryMaintainer  
    IGReleaseRedirectionBuilder  
    IGReleaseUpdater  
    IGReleaseVersionDeleter
    This deletes all the current files for a directory that contains the root of an IG without deleting the hitory infrastructure or past versions
    IGReleaseVersionUpdater  
    IGWebSiteMaintainer
    This assumes the web site is laid out as documented on Confluence
    ImageUpdater  
    IndexMaintainer

    PackageReleaser  
    PastIGMaintainer

    This is the Version {[ver}} {{status}} of the {{title}} Implementation Guide.
